headline.main: Trump Administration to Propose 'Dramatic Reductions' in Foreign Aid
headline.print_headline: Trump Administration to Propose 'Dramatic Reductions' in Foreign Aid

lead_paragraph: The White House budget director confirmed Saturday that the Trump administration will propose "fairly dramatic reductions" in the U.S. foreign aid budget later this month.
snippet: The White House budget director confirmed Saturday that the Trump administration will propose "fairly dramatic reductions" in the U.S. foreign aid budget later this month....
